results.name: a(n) = A000041(n) + n*A032741(n).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
mathematica: Table[PartitionsP[n] + n*(DivisorSigma[0, n] - 1), {n, 0, 50}] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Jul 05 2016 *)
program: (PARI) a(n) = if (n, numbpart(n) + n*(numdiv(n)-1), numbpart(0)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jul 06 2016
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Nov 20 2009
